Package videoRangePanel.vrmethods.IMUMethod

Class IMUMethod

java.lang.Object
videoRangePanel.vrmethods.AbstractVRMethod
videoRangePanel.vrmethods.IMUMethod.IMUMethod
All Implemented Interfaces:
VRMethod
public class IMUMethod extends AbstractVRMethod
Uses sensor information, heading, pitch and roll, plus GPS co-ordinates and height to calculated the position of an animal. Also needs calibration data. Note-Sensor convention

Bearing- 0==north, 90==east 180=south, 270==west

Pitch- 90=-g, 0=0g, -90=g

Tilt 0->180 -camera turning towards left to upside down 0->-180 camera turning right to upside down

All angles are in RADIANS.

Author:
Jamie Macaulay

    • searchIMUDataBlock

      public static AngleDataUnit searchIMUDataBlock(IMUDataBlock imuDataBlock, long timeMillis, long searchInterval)
      Search the datablock for angle data.
      Parameters:
      imuDataBlock - - the current IMU datablock
      timeMillis - - the image time
      searchInterval - - the interval to search for units between
      Returns:
      an AngledatUnit containing average values of units within the search window.
